item.title: Child Themes in Wordpress - Getting Started
item.description:
The Basics of Child Themes There are many reasons why you should create child themes when using any customization. If you modify the CSS or PHP directly in a Wordpress theme, and later update the theme, all of your changes will be lost. With child themes, you can update the parent themes without overwriting your custom styles.
I prefer to use a theme released directly from Wordpress.org, such as Twenty Fourteen, Twenty Fifteen, Twenty Sixteen, etc.
